name: 151121 Fuji
description: This piece is the first photo to be released as a part of my Fuji series that has been ten years in the making. The series has both photos and hybrid pieces re-worked to mix the photos with visual effects. Here, the first snow of the season dusts the top of Fuji. I call this rare kind of Fuji ‘Cigar Fuji’ because the top reminds me of ashes at the tip of a lit cigar.
